Wired Up

64th Place in GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Wired up was developed for the 2021 GMTK game jam. The project was a collaboration between myself and friends as an excersie to improve our workflow as a team before tackling Dare academy. I handled level design for the early stages of the project aswell as audio design and implementation.

Project site: Wired Up

Escape The UwUverse

Dare 2021 Dell Award Winner

Escape the UwUverse is the largest scale projects I have worked on. It was developed for Dare Academy 2021 game design competition hosted by Abertay University. The project took three months do conceptualise and develop. I handled audio implementation, design, music composition, level design and the creation of the "Blu Cow Template" that most game systems were relient on.

Project site: Escape The UwUVerse

Cheese Board

Funny Lil Project :)

Cheese board is a project thats being developed with the goal of deepening my understanding of c++/c# interop. Development began shortly after finishing my honours degree at abertay to keep me in practice with programming.

Project site: Cheese Board

Julia Set Renderer

GPGPU Visualisation

This project was developed as an assignment for the Data Structures and Algorithms 2 module at Abertay University.

Project site: Cheese Board
